description:
Provides a mysql policy resource to create a backup policy.

~> **NOTE:** This attribute `backup_model` only support 'physical' in Terraform TencentCloud provider version 1.16.2

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

BackupModel.description: Backup method. Supported values include: 'physical' - physical backup.

BackupTime.description: Instance backup time, in the format of "HH:mm-HH:mm". Time setting interval is four hours. Default to "02:00-06:00". The following value can be supported: 02:00-06:00, 06:00-10:00, 10:00-14:00, 14:00-18:00, 18:00-22:00, and 22:00-02:00.

MysqlId.description: Instance ID to which policies will be applied.

RetentionPeriod.description: Instance backup retention days. Valid values: [7-730]. And default value is 7.
